Blog.post: urlLink how am i goin to solve this matter??? urlLink

my twins fren had been fighting wif my close fren. Hidayah.... the problem is i dunno wat to do..??? when i talk wif hidayah, the twins will feel jealous.... when i talk to her... they tried to take me away from her.... when i'm close wif the twins, i felt pity on Hidayah!!! i dunno wat i should do??? i'm in a confused matter!!!
urlLink i dun wan to face like this!!!! urlLink

Mdm Zulaiha had asked me bout my frens background that is Liyana.... n of course!!! i hav to b truthful... so i told her all the real stories...she also noe dat gal wanted to attract attention!!! OH MY GOD!!! I dun belief it.... watever!!! but the thing is i dun wan to sit beside her... i dun wan to hear her fake stories n her lies animore... oh my god!!! can anione help me???!!!

tomorrow got to skool n then face mdm zulaiha n other teachers... so boring!!! on thursday got to present my prioject work... oh my god!!! i forgot my malay dance!!! my senior wanted to perform for teachers' day n i forgot to kal one of my senior!!! oh shit!!! i've miss their jokes around especially kak jahan.... i truly missed her jokes....okie got to now!!! bubye!!!
urlLink my lovely cat... snowy... cute huh??? urlLink
urlLink a bigger n real image of my face.... urlLink
urlLink i like her costumes!!! urlLink
urlLink hapi national day n i hav enjoy my celebration!!!! urlLink

yesterday it was indeed fun!!! bout national celebration in skool yesterday... we hav dis competition n my class won the first prize among the sec two level... it's unbelievable!!!! we had not cooperating wif each other n we prepare it last minute!!! whew!!! after the celbration, went to lynn's house... met yani's grp at lynn's house... bout an hour they left... then another grp came up.... someone who admire me.... oh my god!!!! bout 1.30 we left.... we send desi home first then we all went home... when i reach home, i juz sleep...Zzzzzz....juz now watch a hindustan movie... i realli like aishwarya..... i like her eyes!!!! okie... now my stomach feels hungry...okie bubye!!!
